name: Victorious - Taking the Lead
synopsis: Victorious: Taking the Lead fulfills every Victorious fans' dream, allowing them to play as Tori Vega in a series of hilarious Hollywood Arts adventures based on the hit show. Win the lead role in a Hollywood Arts production by playing alongside favorite cast members in a variety of exciting rhythm and dance mini-games featuring songs from the Victorious soundtrack. But watch out, Jade is after the same role!
